short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the button to visit a random boring site
short.zh_CN: 点击按钮随机访问一个无聊的网站

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to provide users with a fun way to kill time. By clicking the button, you'll be taken to a random boring but potentially interesting website. It's a tool for exploring the quirky corners of the internet, perfect for users looking for novelty or inspiration during their leisure time.
long.zh_CN:
这个扩展程序旨在为用户提供一个有趣的方式来打发时间。通过点击按钮，您将随机访问一个无聊但可能有趣的网站。这是一个探索互联网奇妙角落的工具，非常适合在休闲时间寻找新鲜感或灵感的用户。

This extension is designed to provide users with a fun way to kill time. By clicking the button, you'll be taken to a random boring but potentially interesting website. It's a tool for exploring the quirky corners of the internet, perfect for users looking for novelty or inspiration during their leisure time.
